## ThreeDOFControls class

Control scheme for slight rotation and translation movement in response to mouse movements (designed to be used in conjunction with other control schemes)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ThreeDOFControls implements BaseControls 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [BaseControls](./controls.basecontrols.md)

## Remarks

Note: CSS property `touch-action: none` will probably be needed on listener element See [ThreeDOFControlsProps](./controls.threedofcontrolsprops.md) for all properties that can be passed to the constructor.

## Example


```js
const scene = new Scene()
const camera = new PerspectiveCamera(75, window.innerWidth / window.innerHeight, 0.1, 1000)
const cameraRig = new CameraRig(camera, scene)
const controls = new ThreeDOFControls(cameraRig)

controls.enable()
function animate(t) {
 // render loop
 controls.update(t)
}

```
